Key Match Events: Sherfane Rutherford scored 74 off 82 balls, featuring five boundaries and three towering sixes.
Wanindu Hasaranga clean bowled Brandon King with his first delivery, and dismissed Alick Athanaze with a sharp stumping.
Jeffrey Vandersay trapped Shai Hope lbw, after Sri Lanka successfully overturned the initial decision.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka came from behind to win the T20 series 2-1 last week, their first series win over the West Indies in the shortest format.
Sri Lanka are ranked seventh in the ICC ODI rankings, versus the West Indies at 10th.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain disrupted the West Indies innings, prompting the umpires to impose a revised target for the hosts.
Pathum Nissanka was ruled out due to a thigh strain, and was replaced by debutant Nishan Madushka, 25.
